phases.label: Phase 1 · Internal Balance
phases.title: Internal balance and system reset
points: Digestion and sleep quality start to improve
Energy levels feel more stable through the day
You may not see visible hair changes yet — this is expected

phases.label: Phase 2 · Scalp Health
phases.title: Scalp health and follicle activation
points: Dandruff and itchiness begin to settle down
Hair fall stabilises as follicles are activated
Scalp feels cleaner and less greasy between washes

phases.label: Phase 3 · Regrowth
phases.title: Visible baby hair and density
points: Soft baby hair becomes visible along the hairline
Density gradually improves in thinner areas
Consistency now matters more than ever for long-term gains
